nodes.text: Recon Stormtroopers were a specialized unit of the Galactic Empire's Stormtrooper Corps. They were visually similar to Heavy Weapons Stormtroopers, although Recon Stormtroopers wielded a blaster rifle and thermal detonators.
Recon Stormtrooper appear in the mobile video game Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes, first released in 2015.
